 1  """Calendar module for Zinnia templatetags""" 
 2  from datetime import date 
 3  from calendar import HTMLCalendar

 8  from django.core.urlresolvers import reverse 
 9   
10  from zinnia.models import Entry 
11   
12  AMERICAN_TO_EUROPEAN_WEEK_DAYS = [6, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

14   

15 -class ZinniaCalendar(HTMLCalendar): 

16      """Override of HTMLCalendar""" 
17   

18 -    def __init__(self): 

19          """Retrieve and convert the localized first week day 
20          at initialization""" 
21          HTMLCalendar.__init__(self, AMERICAN_TO_EUROPEAN_WEEK_DAYS[ 
22              get_format('FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK')]) 

23   

24 -    def formatday(self, day, weekday): 

25          """Return a day as a table cell with a link 
26          if entries are published this day""" 
27          if day and day in self.day_entries: 
28              day_date = date(self.current_year, self.current_month, day) 
29              archive_day_url = reverse('zinnia_entry_archive_day', 
30                                        args=[day_date.strftime('%Y'), 
31                                              day_date.strftime('%m'), 
32                                              day_date.strftime('%d')]) 
33              return '<td class="%s entry"><a href="%s" '\ 
34                     'rel="archives">%d</a></td>' % ( 
35                  self.cssclasses[weekday], archive_day_url, day) 
36   
37          return super(ZinniaCalendar, self).formatday(day, weekday) 

38   

39 -    def formatmonth(self, theyear, themonth, withyear=True): 

40          """Return a formatted month as a table with 
41          new attributes computed for formatting a day""" 
42          self.current_year = theyear 
43          self.current_month = themonth 
44          self.day_entries = [entries.creation_date.day for entries in 
45                              Entry.published.filter( 
46                                  creation_date__year=theyear, 
47                                  creation_date__month=themonth)] 
48   
49          return super(ZinniaCalendar, self).formatmonth( 
50              theyear, themonth, withyear) 

51   

52 -    def formatweekday(self, day): 

53          """Return a weekday name translated 
54          as a table header.""" 
55          return '<th class="%s">%s</th>' % (self.cssclasses[day], 
56                                             WEEKDAYS_ABBR[day].title()) 

57   

58 -    def formatmonthname(self, theyear, themonth, withyear=True): 

59          """Return a month name translated 
60          as a table row.""" 
61          monthname = '%s %s' % (MONTHS[themonth].title(), theyear) 
62          return '<tr><th colspan="7" class="month">%s</th></tr>' % monthname
